channel.title: Use item on item Requirement?
channel.description: How would I make a requirement of a skill to use an item on item. Such as: Lvl 90 smithing needed if you want to use a anti-dragon shield on a draconic visage?

item.title: Use item on item Requirement?
item.dc:creator: @pkinnubpk pkinnubpk
item.description:
@pkinnubpk wrote:

if(itemUsed == 15187 && useWith == 1540) {
if(playerLevel[13] >= 90) {
deleteItem(15187, getItemSlot(15187), 1);
deleteItem(1540, getItemSlot(1540), 1);
addItem(15185, 1);
sendMessage(“You create an Anti-Dragonfire Sheild!”);
} else {
sendMessage(“You need to have 90 smithing to make the shield.”);
}
}
if(itemUsed == 1540 && useWith == 15187) {
if(playerLevel[13] >= 90) {
deleteItem(1540, getItemSlot(1540), 1);
deleteItem(15187, getItemSlot(15187), 1);
addItem(15185, 1);
sendMessage(“You create an Anti-Dragonfire Sheild!”);
} else {
sendMessage(“You need to have 90 smithing to make the shield.”);
}
}

Read full topic

item.title: Use item on item Requirement?
item.dc:creator: @Benz Benz
item.description:
@Benz wrote:

[quote=“pkinnubpk, post:2, topic:222338”]its your lucky day little boy…

        if(itemUsed == 15187 && useWith == 1540) {
           deleteItem(15187, getItemSlot(15187), 1);
           deleteItem(1540, getItemSlot(1540), 1);
    if(playerLevel[10] >= 90)
           addItem(15185, 1);
           sendMessage("You create an Antifire Sheild!");
        }[/quote]

No that fails.

It deletes your items if you don’t have 90 + smithing

Read full topic
